tiles.title: Senior Property Tax Exemption
tiles.description: A property tax exemption is available for senior Colorado residents or surviving spouses, provided they meet the requirements. You must apply by July 15 of the year in which you seek an exemption. Applications postmarked by July 15 are valid, but you have to wait for January 2 of the following year if you miss this cut-off. Additionally, exemptions are only considered for the year in which you apply, not for previous years.
